title.rendered: Asset Management Group Joins MAI Capital Management

content.rendered:
As of July 31, 2023, Asset Management Group is now a part of MAI Capital Management.

If you are an Asset Management Group client, you can reach your advisor team at:

Glenn Movish
Senior Wealth Advisor
Glenn.Movish@mai.capital
847-291-7909

Anna Benner
Senior Client Services Specialist
Anna.Benner@mai.capital
847-291-7909

Ryan Hannifan
Portfolio Management Analyst
Ryan.Hannifan@mai.capital
847-291-7909

As a result of our new partnership, Asset Management Group clients will now have access to:

  • A firm with a 50-year history of taking care of clients, each other, and the community 
  • The backing of an extensive and experienced team
  • Expansive resources to meet your financial needs

 

A note from Rick Buoncore, Managing Partner of MAI Capital Management:

“Glenn’s experience in wealth management and unique ability to build meaningful relationships with clients perfectly aligns with our commitment to client-centric financial services.”

excerpt.rendered: As of July 31, 2023, Asset Management Group is now a part of MAI Capital Management.
